metadata.title: CVE-2024-50084 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: microchip: vcap api: Fix memory leaks in vcap_api_encode_rule_test()Commit a3c1e45156ad ("net: microchip: vcap: Fix use-after-free error inkunit test") fixed the use-after-free error, but introduced belowmemory leaks by removing necessary vcap_free_rule(), add it to fix it.	unreferenced object 0xffffff80ca58b700 (size 192):	  comm "kunit_try_catch", pid 1215, jiffies 4294898264	  hex dump (first 32 bytes):	    00 12 7a 00 05 00 00 00 0a 00 00 00 64 00 00 00  ..z.........d...	    00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 04 0b cc 80 ff ff ff  ................	  backtrace (crc 9c09c3fe):	    [<0000000052a0be73>] kmemleak_alloc+0x34/0x40	    [<0000000043605459>] __kmalloc_cache_noprof+0x26c/0x2f4	    [<0000000040a01b8d>] vcap_alloc_rule+0x3cc/0x9c4	    [<000000003fe86110>] vcap_api_encode_rule_test+0x1ac/0x16b0	    [<00000000b3595fc4>] kunit_try_run_case+0x13c/0x3ac	    [<0000000010f5d2bf>]     Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-50084` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-9.9').
